original_text: Everyone will be crying loudly in the whole country of Egypt. Nothing like that has ever happened before now, and it will never happen again.
korean_text: 애굽 온 땅에 전무후무한 큰 부르짖음이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: in the whole country of Egypt
Nothing like that has ever happened before now
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같은 일은 이전에 결코 일어난 적이 없다

sentences.original_text: and it will never happen again
